metadata.title: Complete Business Software Categories Database
metadata.description: Comprehensive database of business software types categorized by industry and business scale

general_business_software.description: Software applicable across all industries and business scales

specialized_tools.description: Optional but valuable tools for business enhancement

micro_businesses.description: Street vendors, home-based businesses, individual service providers

small_businesses.description: Local shops, small restaurants, single-location services

medium_businesses.description: Multi-location businesses, manufacturing units, established services

digital_adoption_challenges: Low digital literacy in rural areas
Resistance to change in traditional industries
